page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: In our area there are 16 farms and 2 piggeries.There are also stables with hens,geese,horses,and goats.Most of the farms we saw had cattle and sheep, and all of them had fields of crops in.Most of the farms were in the Cop- manthorpe and Acaster Malbis area.Bet_ ween these two places there is a lot of open land for farms.In the fields the crops include sugar beet,barley, spring barley,potatoes,oil seed rape, wheat,spring wheat,silage and grazing. Where "Direct Windows" are now,at the Acaster Malbis juntion,there used to be poultry houses.There is a farm full of goats at Nova Scotia,near Acaster Malbis.
